name: Uzumaki
goals: Create a simple, focused recipe site without the clutter of ads and blog content
Prioritize accessibility and visual clarity while maintaining a colorful palette
Provide useful tools that make you want to get your kitchen dirty
learned: How to use React's Contexts to globally update an app's color and layout
How to use React's BrowserRouter and HashRouter to handle stateful urls in a single-page app
How to implement a Full-Stack web app using MongoDB and Express.js
